name: Dinnersaur: Friend or Feast?
description: A 2D resource management game about a young human who has come of age to go out into the world of dinosaurs and provide for their village. Players can explore the environment, cut down plants for resources and meet many dinosaurs. When encountering a dinosaur, players can choose to feed or fight it for different benefits or drawbacks. These choices will have an effect on the populations of both humans and dinosaurs, and the player must think carefully about each action in order to obtain the best outcome by balancing both species’ populations.
